remarks: Choice-free analogue of ~ iblsub .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 11-Nov-2017.)
statement:
ibladdnc.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
ibladdnc.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
ibladdnc.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
ibladdnc.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblsubnc.m $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
iblsubnc $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
